item.title: I need to learn how to code [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

go armand, that’s not what he means. He want to learn how to code a pi server.

Okay, It’s a little bit the same as an delta. In my opinion. Don’t flame me for this. Pi uses different classes and is packaged what is not the case in a lot of delta sources. Altough the main class also is client.java. To learn how to code pi you can search up some tutorials in the tutorial section or read through your client.java and other files and see how things are handled/done.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to learn how to code [Pi]

item.title: I need to learn how to code [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

If you’ve hosted a delta you should know how to portfoward.
For PI.

Open up client.java in your client files.
Find server = “127.0.0.1”
Change it to your one…
Bamm… its online.

Read full topic
